org.point85.uom

Interface UnitOfMeasure

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PowerUOM, ProductUOM, QuotientUOM, ScalarUOM

    public interface UnitOfMeasure
    UnitOfMeasure is the interface for a unit Of measure.

      • getBaseSymbol

        java.lang.String getBaseSymbol()
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Get the unit of measure's symbol in the fundamental units for that system. For example a Newton is a kg.m/s2.
        Returns:
        Base symbol
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception
